title: Tempo: Australia in the 70's [Italan version]
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Roland Beckett and Keith Gow
brief_description: Gives impressions of life and industry in Australia at the beginnings of the 1970’s with the emphasis on the potential for growth and development. Peter Weir co-wrote the script with Keith Gow and Martin Von Borneman was the Director of Photography. Animation by Yoram Gross. The original production has been dubbed in Italian.
